thread.title: Bank of New York Mellon Plans to Move Its Corporate Headquarters in Lower Manhattan

author: Justin Baer
title: Bank of New York Mellon Plans to Move Its Corporate Headquarters in Lower Manhattan
text:
Bank of New York Mellon Corp. is moving its global headquarters for the second time in less than four years.
The custody bank plans to relocate all of its employees from Brookfield Place, the downtown office complex formerly known as the World Financial Center, to a nearby building it owns at 101 Barclay St. The move consolidates BNY Mellonâ€™s presence in New York, bringing together some 4,500 employees under one roof, a spokesman for the bank said.
